SEARCH
Package org.spaceinvaders.handlers

Class BaseHandler

java.lang.Object
org.spaceinvaders.handlers.BaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetDataHandler, SignUpHandler
public abstract class BaseHandler extends Object implements HttpHandler
BaseHandler.java
Abstract base class for handling HTTP requests. Provides common functionality for handling POST requests, parsing JSON input, and handling exceptions.
Since:
11/27/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aryan, Gathik, Abhirath, Ibrahim, Jayant, Dedeepya

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseHandler

      public BaseHandler()

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles incoming HTTP requests. Only accepts POST requests and parses the request body as JSON. Delegates processing to the processRequest(HttpExchange, JsonObject) method. Handles common exceptions and sends appropriate HTTP responses.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface HttpHandler
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HttpExchange object representing the HTTP request and response.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during handling.

    • processRequest

      protected abstract void processRequest(HttpExchange exchange, com.google.gson.JsonObject json) throws Exception
      Processes the HTTP request with the parsed JSON body. This method must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific request handling logic.
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HttpExchange object representing the HTTP request and response.
      json - the JsonObject parsed from the request body.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during request processing.

    • sendHTTPResponse

      public void sendHTTPResponse(HttpExchange exchange, int statusCode, String message) throws IOException
      Sends an HTTP response to the client.
      Parameters:
      exchange - the HttpExchange object representing the HTTP request and response.
      statusCode - the HTTP status code to send.
      message - the response message to send.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the response.
